extendedInfo.description: Odd Side Ales, one of the smallest breweries in the country located in downtown Grand Haven, MI. Being a tiny brewery allows us to produce truly unique crafted beers. We like to geek out on beer, it is our passion. We produce a variety of different beers with some unusual ingredients like habenaros, figs, appricots and pineapple. So stop in often as our taps will change constantly with new beers, we usually have a number of different beers on tap each week.

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: All it needs is a button that says \"Click here to have this beer delivered to your door\" Seriously though, best...beer...ever!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mmmm beer app!
reviews.comment: This app tells me exactly when I need to head out to get some PB stout goodness. The only thing missing is a teleport feature to get to the brewery.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: J
reviews.comment: Nice!  Mug clubbers 2nd most important tool, first is the mug.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Now I can always see what\'s on tap at one of the best breweries in the state!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Discontinued?
reviews.comment: App is no longer active. Why is it still out here? Thanks for wasting my time.
reviews.author: A Google User
